I have a tendency to think gloomy, pessimistic thoughts.
I often have trouble finishing things that I've  started.
In social situations, I am ta lka tive  and spontaneous.
I am usually uncomfortable in a group of people.
I enjoy people and just like  to be around them.
I have a somewhat defensive, touchy nature.
Adversity just stimulates me to push a l i t t l e  harder.
I am somewhat serious and very deeply emotional.
I have a warm s p ir it .  I am liv e ly  and enjoy liv in g .
By nature I seem to be a pretty good "peacemaker."

I tend to be pretty tolerant of other people.
When things go wrong I knuckle down and try  harder.
I am calm and relaxed, and rather unemotional.
I tend to get my feelings hurt fa ir ly  eas ily .
I see myself as a cheerful, sociable person.
Socia lly , I am a pretty outgoing person.
A strong w ill is one of my best assets.

I usually have a good time at parties.
